code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";export var cartSlice=createSlice({name:"cart",initialState:[],reducers:{add:function add(state,action){state.push(action.payload);},remove:function remove(state,action){return state.filter(function(item){return item.id!==action.payload;});},removeAll:function removeAll(state){return state=[];}}});var _cartSlice$actions=cartSlice.actions,add=_cartSlice$actions.add,remove=_cartSlice$actions.remove,removeAll=_cartSlice$actions.removeAll;export{add,remove,removeAll};export default cartSlice.reducer;
